content:
The person represented himself as a representative of the Public Union and for $ 5000 promised to issue a resident of the resident of the adviser to the Commander of the Battalion of the Armed Forces, which would allegedly help to avoid mobilization.

About thisShe reported March 18National police.

According to her, during the meeting with the potential 'client', the offender even put on a military uniform to convince the interlocutor that he himself was an adviser to the battalion commander of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

In addition, the suspect also said that at the beginning of a large -scale invasion of the Armed Forces, the Armed Forces of Ukraine to take away weapons to repel the occupiers in the Kyiv region.

Якreported the armyinformin Odessa declared suspicion of a fraudster who cheated the families of defenders by UAH 3.6 million.
title: Fake adviser to battalion commander exposed in Kyiv
